features.additionalInfo: Receive notification from bank of your nominated transactions (e.g. low account balance warning; credits over $500)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be identifiable in terms of legislative requirements. Lending criteria apply.

fees.name: Information fee - Search
fees.additionalInfo: $20 per request, plus $1 per page copied. Payable when we provide information or copies to you or a third party that relates to a security, dealing document, or any record relating to your Contract or loan account (other than information you are entitled to obtain under the National Consumer Credit Code).

fees.name: Information fee - Per Page
fees.additionalInfo: $20 per request, plus $1 per page copied. Payable when we provide information or copies to you or a third party that relates to a security, dealing document, or any record relating to your Contract or loan account (other than information you are entitled to obtain under the National Consumer Credit Code).

fees.name: Bulk coin purchase fee
fees.additionalInfo: Minimum fee $2.00

fees.name: Bulk coin purchase fee - Sourced Externally
fees.additionalInfo: $8.00 per bag

fees.name: Foreign currency conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3.00% of the Australian Dollar equivalent is payable for transactions made in a foreign currency.

fees.name: Replacement card fee - In Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on any replacement card issued within the expiry period within Australia if a replacement card has been requested in the preceding 12 months.

fees.name: Replacement card fee - International
fees.additionalInfo: For any replacement card issued overseas

fees.name: SMS alert fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each SMS alert that is sent to you notifying you of account balances and/or other nominated transactions.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer trace
fees.additionalInfo: Fee is estimate only

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to establish a Credit Limit or when you request an increase in the Credit Limit. *Excludes Valuation and Solicitor Costs. Valuation fees are required to be paid upfront.

fees.name: Administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we consent to any subdivision, lease, discharge, partial discharge, change of name, release of Security provider, changing a policy of lenders mortgage insurance, creation of subsequent Security Interest or any dealing in relation to a Security.

fees.name: Default notice fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a notice informing you of a default under your contract.

fees.name: Discharge administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where secured by Land Title: Payable immediately before you pay out the Contract where there is a Security registered at any Land Titles Registration Office. Where secured by Goods Security Agreement: Payable immediately before you pay out the Contract and your Credit Facility is closed.

fees.name: Guarantee fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each guarantee provided.

fees.name: Law stationers fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable for costs and disbursements we pay to our Law Stationers for providing information on a security or acting for us in connection with the Contract or a Security.

fees.name: Legal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable for any costs and disbursements we have to pay to a Solicitor or conveyancer for acting for us in relation to the Contract, Settlement, a Security, Court Application or Discharge.

fees.name: Mercantile agents fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. The amount payable when you are in default and we send a mercantile agent to discuss this with you.

fees.name: Registration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable for costs we have to pay to a government body to register any documents in relation to a security.

fees.name: Security substitution fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to substitute a Security.

fees.name: Title insurance premium
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable.  Payable for the amount we are charged by our insurer for any title and loan protection insurance policy that we require.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we request a valuation of an existing or proposed Security Property

fees.name: Annual fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to your account on the last day of the month in which the primary card is activated and thereafter annually on anniversary date.

fees.name: Cash advance fee - Domestic
fees.additionalInfo: If your account has a negative balance you will be charged 2.00% of the cash advance amount. The minimum fee is $1.50, the maximum fee is $20.00. If your account has a positive balance $0.00. Cash advance fees will be calculated from date of transaction and charged on the last day of the statement period.

fees.name: Cash advance fee - International
fees.additionalInfo: If your account has a negative balance you will be charged 2.00% of the cash advance amount. The minimum fee is $4.00, the maximum fee is $20.00. If your account has a positive balance $0.00. Cash advance fees will be calculated from date of transaction and charged on the last day of the statement period.

fees.name: Disputed transaction fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable per item and charged when a copy of a disputed transaction is requested.

fees.name: Missed payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on the last day of the second consecutive statement period, in which the minimum repayment is not made and thereafter on the last day of each statement period that the minimum repayment is not made by the due date.

fees.name: Production default fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when you default under your Contract by failing to provide us with any document we reasonably require by the date advised.

fees.name: Production fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable for amounts that must be paid to the holder of a prior Security Interest in a Security Property for producing any document in relation to that Security Property.

fees.name: Stamp duty
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when a liability arises to pay duty to the relevant government body in relation to the Contract, a Security, or any other dutiable document.

fees.name: Card fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable per card provided and charged to your account on the last day of the month in which each card is created and thereafter annually on card creation anniversary date.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Base rate disclosed. Margins will be applied.
Base rate disclosed. Margins will be applied.
Base rate disclosed. Margins will be applied.
